answers.answer: That's accurate, in fact I lost weight with both pregnancies beyond that point. I was at 21lb, now down to 18 lb total weight gain.
I gained 10lbs with my first. Now iam 39w2d with #2 and ive gained 7lbs. So at 35w i was at like 6lbs.they say that your 3rd trimester you gain mpre but idk. Everyone is different :)

I've read a pound a week at this point is normal. I think it is different for everyone though. I haven't gained any weight at all up till recently because of preeclampsia (I've got water weight on me) I actually weigh less then I did before pregnancy. As long as your baby is putting on weight and your OB says everything is good I wouldn't worry

question: What's everyone at for total weight gain around the 35 week mark?Someone said this is where weight peaks and next few weeks won't be much gain...doesn't sound right to me
title: weight gain
